dialogue_turns.speaker: Anchor
dialogue_turns.text: Unstable weather is rolling into Astana and Almaty this week, like a moody guest overstaying their welcome.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unstable weather is rolling into Astana and Almaty this week, like a moody guest overstaying their welcome.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Co-host
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's bringing some serious drama—thunderstorms, hail, the whole shebang from June 6th to the 8th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's bringing some serious drama-thunderstorms, hail, the whole shebang from June sixth to the eighth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable weather is expected to persist in Astana and Almaty from June 6 to 8, with forecasts of thunderstorms and hail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Anchor
dialogue_turns.text: So Thursday looks pretty calm in Astana, partly cloudy, no rain, but those winds are gonna pick up during the day to like 9 to 14 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So Thursday looks pretty calm in Astana, partly cloudy, no rain, but those winds are gonna pick up during the day to like nine to fourteen meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 6: Partly cloudy skies with no precipitation. Winds shifting from southwest to northwest at 1"6 m/s at night and 9"14 m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Co-host
dialogue_turns.text: And then Friday? That's when things get interesting. Thunderstorms roll in with gusts up to 20 m/s.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Friday? That's when things get interesting. Thunderstorms roll in with gusts up to twenty meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 7: Partly cloudy, with rain and thunderstorms expected during the day. Northeasterly winds at 9"14 m/s, with gusts reaching 15"20 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Anchor
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and temperatures take a dip too—down to the mid-20s Celsius in the daytime after being near 30 just the day before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and temperatures take a dip too-down to the mid-20s Celsius in the daytime after being near thirty just the day before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nighttime temperatures will be +12 to +14ÂC, rising to +28 to +30ÂC during the day. June 7: Partly cloudy, with rain and thunderstorms expected during the day. ... Temperatures will range from +17 to +19ÂC at night and +25 to +27ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Co-host
dialogue_turns.text: Almaty's looking a bit warmer though, still hitting low 30s on Thursday, but they're also getting those scattered storms by Friday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almaty's looking a bit warmer though, still hitting low 30s on Thursday, but they're also getting those scattered storms by Friday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 6: Partly cloudy with no precipitation. ... Temperatures will be +20 to +22ÂC at night and +32 to +34ÂC during the day. June 7: Partly cloudy with short rain showers and thunderstorms expected during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Anchor
dialogue_turns.text: And Minister Yerlan Nyssanbayev had already hinted at a hot summer for Kazakhstan, especially the southwest possibly hitting 45 degrees!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Minister Yerlan Nyssanbayev had already hinted at a hot summer for Kazakhstan, especially the southwest possibly hitting forty five degrees!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Minister of Ecology and Natural Resources Yerlan Nyssanbayev shared the weather forecast for the upcoming summer in Kazakhstan. In some parts of the southwest, temperatures could reach 45ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Co-host
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that is scorching. But at least rainfall in June and July should be around normal for most areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that is scorching. But at least rainfall in June and July should be around normal for most areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rainfall in June and July is expected to be within normal levels, though the north, south, and southeast may receive slightly more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Anchor
dialogue_turns.text: Though some regions might get a little extra——the north, south, and southeast could see slightly above average precipitation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Though some regions might get a little extra--the north, south, and southeast could see slightly above average precipitation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rainfall in June and July is expected to be within normal levels, though the north, south, and southeast may receive slightly more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Co-host
dialogue_turns.text: But then it dries out in August and September, with temps maybe a degree above usual. Always subject to change though, you know how forecasts go.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then it dries out in August and September, with temps maybe a degree above usual. Always subject to change though, you know how forecasts go.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In August and September, less rainfall is expected, and temperatures may be about 1ÂC above normal. This forecast is preliminary and subject to change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Anchor
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Still, good to be prepared if you're in Astana or Almaty this week——keep an umbrella handy!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Still, good to be prepared if you're in Astana or Almaty this week--keep an umbrella handy!
